api_list.name: Favourite Champs. v1
api_list.description: Get the favourite Champs Matches. v1
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://oddsapi-v2.p.rapidapi.com/Prelive/api/Prelive/GetFavouriteChamps?skinId=wplay&lang=es-ES"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "oddsapi-v2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Prelive Menu. v1

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "oddsapi-v2.p.rapidapi.com"
